com.revivedstandards.view

Class StandardWindowView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • com.revivedstandards.view.StandardWindowView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StandardWindowView
extends java.awt.Canvas
    This class is the class that instantiates the Screen. It takes four parameters: width, height, a title, and the Game class itself that will automatically be added to the frame as a component due to it extending class once it is instantiated.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
